ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: Helps you late hit better and farm the jungle faster.
ItemTooltips.boots: Every hero needs boots to run faster.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good HP regen when you are low.
ItemTooltips.tango: HP regen fr when you get harassed.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Gives good damage and allows you to chase better.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_health: Gives good HP regen in lane. Builds into Battle Fury.
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: Gives some damage and will protect you from harass.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Good if you get a different UAM or others on your team benefit from the aura.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Allows you to kill everyone with out getting sunned.
ItemTooltips.bfury: Allows you to farm the jungle and lanes very well. You will also cleave crits for more killing in team fights.
ItemTooltips.manta: Provides illusions for extra damage and protection.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: Gives you lifesteal which, when combined with crits will heal you a lot.
ItemTooltips.desolator: Gives you lots of damage, get it counter high armor enemies.
ItemTooltips.yasha: Gives good early damage and move speed.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Good early item for chasing and ganking.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: Gives you stuns and lots of damage.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Gives mana regeneration and agility in lane.

AbilityTooltips.phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger: A good slow and useful for last hitting in lane.
AbilityTooltips.phantom_assassin_phantom_strike: Allows you to chase and escape as well as hit very fast.
AbilityTooltips.phantom_assassin_blur: Keeps you from being hit and warns you of nearby enemies.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Take these once you have to.
